Mission

826michigan inspires school-aged students to write confidently and skillfully with the help of adult volunteers in their communities.

Browse our online store. All proceeds support our non-profit writing center. Shop for robots, cyborgs, and clockwork mechanisms of all kinds! You’ll also find our profoundly brilliant student publications on sale here, too.
